transArray.content: The room was extremely clean and comfortable. The front desk staff was friendly and the breakfast was delicious.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel rooms and the room ladies. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. , cleanliness and safety come first. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
